viewsWelcome.actions.signIn:
Start with quick actions once you sign in.

[$(github) Sign in with GitHub](command:zennpad.signIn)

Need to adjust settings?

[$(gear) Open ZennPad Settings](command:zennpad.openSettingsPanel)
viewsWelcome.actions.configure:
Connect a Zenn repo to enable actions.

[$(gear) Open Settings](command:zennpad.openSettingsPanel)

After setting owner/repo, refresh the tree.

[$(refresh) Refresh](command:zennpad.refresh)
viewsWelcome.actions.ready:
Quick actions for your Zenn workspace:

- $(folder-opened) [Open Zenn root](command:zennpad.openZennRoot)
- $(globe) [Open on Zenn](command:zennpad.openOnZenn)
- $(sync) [Deploy to Zenn](command:zennpad.deployToZenn)
- $(settings-gear) [Open Settings](command:zennpad.openSettingsPanel)
viewsWelcome.repos.configure:
Set GitHub owner/repo to start syncing.

[$(gear) Open ZennPad Settings](command:zennpad.openSettingsPanel)

After configuring, refresh to load content.

[$(refresh) Refresh](command:zennpad.refresh)
viewsWelcome.search.configure:
Search is available after sign-in and repo setup.

[$(github) Sign in](command:zennpad.signIn)

[$(gear) Configure repo](command:zennpad.openSettingsPanel)
viewsWelcome.search.ready:
Search filenames, titles, and bodies across your Zenn repo.

Use the welcome carousel below to learn the key flows, then type a query above.

[$(refresh) Refresh](command:zennpad.refresh)
